scenarios.name: Create business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_salon_uc3 name = MariaSalon slug = maria-salon-uc3 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 name = DowntownSalon slug = downtown-salon timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create stylist A user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_stylist_a_uc3 email = stylista.uc3@example.com name = StylistA status = active

scenarios.name: Create stylist A resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_stylist_a biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 location_id = loc_uc3 type = host host_user_id = usr_stylist_a_uc3 name = StylistA slug = stylist-a timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false buffer_before_minutes = 5 buffer_after_minutes = 10

scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_stylist_b biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 location_id = loc_uc3 type = host host_user_id = usr_stylist_b_uc3 name = StylistB slug = stylist-b timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false buffer_before_minutes = 5 buffer_after_minutes = 10

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 name = SalonServices slug = salon-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create color service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_color biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 service_group_id = sg_uc3 name = ColorTreatment slug = color-treatment type = appointment visibility = public min_advance_booking_hours = 24 requires_approval = false allow_waitlist = true status = active

scenarios.name: Create compensation role senior
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_role_templates id = crt_senior_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 location_id = loc_uc3 name = SeniorStylist slug = senior-stylist status = active sort_order = 10

scenarios.name: Create compensation role junior
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_role_templates id = crt_junior_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 location_id = loc_uc3 name = JuniorStylist slug = junior-stylist status = active sort_order = 20

scenarios.name: Create compensation plan
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plans id = cp_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 name = ColorCommission slug = color-commission status = active currency = USD location_id = loc_uc3 service_id = svc_color is_default = true priority = 10

scenarios.name: Create compensation plan version
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_versions id = cpv_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 compensation_plan_id = cp_uc3 version_number = 1 status = active effective_from_at = 2026-01-01T00:00:00Z is_current = true

scenarios.name: Create senior commission rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_rules id = cpr_senior_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 compensation_plan_version_id = cpv_uc3 name = SeniorColorSplit selector_type = resource resource_id = res_stylist_a role_template_id = crt_senior_uc3 calculation_mode = percent_of_line_total percent_bps = 7000 priority = 10

scenarios.name: Create junior commission rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_rules id = cpr_junior_uc3 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 compensation_plan_version_id = cpv_uc3 name = JuniorColorSplit selector_type = resource resource_id = res_stylist_b role_template_id = crt_junior_uc3 calculation_mode = percent_of_line_total percent_bps = 5000 priority = 20

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_color biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 name = ColorTreatmentOffer slug = color-offer execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_color biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 offer_id = ofr_color version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 120 min_duration_min = 120 max_duration_min = 120 base_price_minor = 20000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create booking order
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_orders id = bo_uc3_001 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 offer_id = ofr_color offer_version_id = ov_color status = confirmed currency = USD subtotal_minor = 20000 total_minor = 20000 requested_start_at = 2026-02-27T14:00:00Z requested_end_at = 2026-02-27T16:00:00Z confirmed_start_at = 2026-02-27T14:00:00Z confirmed_end_at = 2026-02-27T16:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Create fulfillment unit
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_units id = fu_uc3_001 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 booking_order_id = bo_uc3_001 kind = service_task status = planned planned_start_at = 2026-02-27T14:00:00Z planned_end_at = 2026-02-27T16:00:00Z location_id = loc_uc3

scenarios.name: Assign senior stylist
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_assignments id = fa_uc3_001 biz_id = biz_salon_uc3 fulfillment_unit_id = fu_uc3_001 resource_id = res_stylist_a status = confirmed role_label = lead starts_at = 2026-02-27T14:00:00Z ends_at = 2026-02-27T16:00:00Z is_primary = true compensation_split_bps = 7000

scenarios.name: Create walk-in queue
